title: bdproto
description:
Cite the source of the dataset as:

Marsico, Egidio, Sebastien Flavier, Annemarie Verkerk and Steven Moran. 2018. BDPROTO: A Database of Phonological Inventories from Ancient and Reconstructed Languages.
